original_text: As people, all of us belong to Adam's family. So all of us must die. But all people who belong to Christ will live again after death.
korean_text: 아담 안에서 모든 사람이 죽은 것 같이 그리스도 안에서 모든 사람이 삶을 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: As people, all of us belong to Adam's family.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람으로서 우리 모두는 아담의 가족에 속합니다.

sentences.original_text: So all of us must die.
But all people who belong to Christ
